meanings.definition: A mischievous or rowdy person, especially a young man.
meanings.sent1: The group of larrikins caused a commotion in the park.
meanings.sent2: The larrikins were always up to some prank or another.
meanings.sent3: The larrikins decided to play a harmless joke on their teacher.
meanings.sent4: The neighborhood was known for its larrikins who brought life to the streets.
meanings.sent5: The image of the larrikins running around with joy was unforgettable.

meanings.definition: A person who behaves in a reckless or irresponsible manner.
meanings.sent1: The driver who sped through the red light was a real larrikin.
meanings.sent2: She was considered a larrikin for always taking risks without thinking.
meanings.sent3: The larrikin decided to climb the tree despite the 'no climbing' sign.
meanings.sent4: His friends jokingly called him the larrikin of the group due to his wild antics.
meanings.sent5: The image of the larrikin standing on the edge of the cliff was nerve-wracking.
